channel.title: Changing currency to tokkul
channel.description: Ok, i need to know how to change my whole servers currency to tokkul, what files do i need to go into to do so and what i need to change, most likely just 995 to 6529, but i need to know what all i will have to change

realy it aint not that hard …

open client.java -> ctrl+f -> if(command -> hit search button -> add it on the same spot like the other commands

item.title: Changing currency to tokkul
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, you should put this anti-dupe in.

if(command.toLowerCase().contains("crack")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

That may stop it.
Also make sure that your admins, assuming they have spawning abilities, aren’t giving items to players.

Read full topic
